: : Kup : :

Kup took Maxima's hand, sealing the deal, before she left. He watched her fly off untill she was shot...


EmprzAnastazia@... wrote:
In a message dated 6/3/03 6:00:04 PM Central Daylight Time, roborick007@... writes:


: : Kup : :
Kup gets the comm message from Rattrap.

Kup(via comm): I am leading a team at the Ark.

Kup closes the link, and listens to Maxima.

Kup: I remember you very well from the great wars, Maxima. I know why you are really doing this. It's Megatron. However, for some reason, I believe and trust you.

She smirked. She had made an impact upon Cybertronians. 


He looks to his troops.

Kup: Maximals stand down.

He looks back at the Decepticon femme.

Kup: I'll leave the Ark in your care, but we'll be watching carefully.



The smirk became a smile of relief. More of something that was pure, which was odd or never seen in her. Anything good was more than a rarity. 

She bowed to Kup, "I shall not betray our trust." her voice stated with a serious tone. 

Then extended her hand to him to seal the trust.
